a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Percentage increase in mean male vs. female height over a century
The relative increase in mean male versus mean female height for people born in 1996 versus 1896. This
therefore represents the difference in the mean height of adults who reached the age of 18 in 2014 versus 1914.
Data source: NCD RisC, Human Height (2017)
